DataElement.preferredName: Future Cessation Cigarette Smoking Or Tobacco Use Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text that describes whether or not a person is considering stopping smoking or use of tobacco products and the timeframe for taking action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A time that is yet to come.:A stopping.

A stopping.

Property.preferredDefinition: Inhaling smoke from tobacco in the form of a cigarette.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Inhaling smoke from tobacco in the form of a cigarette.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

PermissibleValues.value: No, I am not thinking of quitting

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: A time that is yet to come.: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.: A stopping.

A time that is yet to come.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
A stopping.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.: On the inside; contained in.: A number with no fractional part.::6: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
On the inside; contained in.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.: On the inside; contained in.: A number with no fractional part.::30: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
On the inside; contained in.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A stopping.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.:Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: A stopping.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
